spa.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a place where the water has special minerals in it, and where people go to improve their health by drinking the water or swimming in it
spa.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a place where people go to improve their health and beauty, especially through swimming, exercise, beauty treatments etc
spa.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a bath or pool that sends currents of hot water around you
